show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content:
My guest Gina Nikkel, PhD is the Executive Director of the Foundation for Excellence in Mental Health Care.  It is the... <!--more--> most interesting, creative and important foundation in the entire field of mental health.  She and I talk about its many pioneering projects, including the Mother Bear Community Action Network, a family support network, as well as several of most effective mental health interventions available today.   

originally broadcast 01.16.13
